commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four. Okay, that's good for now. Let's take a ten minute break.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oof, that was tough. We never get to take it easy.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I am amazed at how well you are keeping up with us, Shioriko. For you not to be short of breath is astonishing.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yes, and your movements are so graceful. I couldn't help but watch you, even though I should be focusing on my own moves.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was in awe, too.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: No, I still have much room for improvement.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Aren't you tired, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Please. By all means, do be more rigorous with your training. Do not stop here for my sake.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: She's so inspiring... I need to work even harder.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Oh, please excuse me. I must leave now for today.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wow, is it this late already? All right. Good work today.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Likewise, thank you. See you next time.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Shioriko goes home early sometimes, right? I wonder why?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: She probably has a lesson to go to. Didn't Ai find out that she takes Japanese dance, tea ceremony, and flower arrangement lessons? Among other things, too.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I can't believe she takes so many extracurricular lessons!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: She takes a ton of lessons, she's in our school idol club, and she volunteers on the weekends... When the heck does she have time for student council stuff?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think she said she does that work before club practice and during her lunch break. Lately, she even seems to come to school early to get her work done.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She's incredible... I don't think I could ever do all that, even if I were in her shoes.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Are you suuure she really takes all those lessons? I'll have to see it to believe it!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That settles it! Let's follow her!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We're in the middle of practice, you know?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But I wanna see Shio-ti doing her lessons! Seriously, I really wanna follow her!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Practice is important, of course, but this might be a good chance for us to get to know Shioriko better.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I want to know too. Rina-chan Board says, "Restless."

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh* Okay. Just for today though, all right?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Thanks, Prez!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: This is the Japanese dance school that Shioriko goes to, right?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What a fancy building.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: In we go!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: W-Wait, Kasumi!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Are you sure we should just barge into a fancy building like this?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You're right. We shouldn't just waltz on in.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Oh, look at this sign.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Let's see, it says, "Visitors may watch lessons in session. Please inquire at the reception desk."

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: So as long as we talk to reception first, we can watch Shioriko's lesson?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Sweet! Let's go and watch!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Shioriko is so beautiful...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yeah. I can't take my eyes off her elegant movements.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Shioriko really is amazing.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Grumble* I can do that too, you know!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I doubt it.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Sob*
